overview:
Co-Founder and Chief Technology Officer (CTO) of Handheld Culture Limited

Howard graduated from Cornell University with a degree in computer science. He has over eight years of technology and management consulting experience garnered at Big Four consulting companies, including Accenture and Capgemini. His focus is on IT strategy, project management, system integration, and application delivery across vertical markets, including media, entertainment, communication and high technology. Howard leads the technology department at Handheld Culture, focusing on business development and IT solutions. Howard is an avid reader, not only on the latest technology innovations, but also Chinese history, biographies and martial arts fiction.

Outside of Handheld Culture, Howard also serves on the Hong Kong advisory board of Social Media Week 2012, a multi-city global conference connecting people, content and conversations around emerging trends in social and mobile media.
